amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the fee determination based on equitable relief provision.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-29 to strike the fee determination based on equitable relief provision.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 228 (Roll no. 141).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Deutch amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 228 (Roll no. 141).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
